entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
